00025 // Embeds version info in the executable, but does not load at run time.

00027 
00032 #if !defined(DL_WRITER_H)
00033 #define DL_WRITER_H
00034 
00035 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00036 #pragma once
00037 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00038 
00040 // DL_Writer
00042 
00052 class DL_Writer
00053 {
00054 public:
00055         DL_Writer() : m_handle(0) {}
00056 
00057         virtual ~DL_Writer() {};
00058 
00059         void section(const char* name) const
00060         {
00061                 dxfString(0, "SECTION");
00062                 dxfString(2, name);
00063         }
00064 
00065         void sectionHeader() const { section("HEADER"); }
00066         void sectionTables() const { section("TABLES"); }
00067         void sectionBlocks() const { section("BLOCKS"); }
00068         void sectionEntities() const { section("ENTITIES"); }
00069         void sectionClasses() const { section("CLASSES"); }
00070         void sectionObjects() const { section("OBJECTS"); }
00071         void sectionEnd() const { dxfString(0, "ENDSEC"); }
00072         void dxfEOF() const { dxfString(0, "EOF"); }
00073         void comment(const char* text) const { dxfString(999, text); }
00074 
00075         void entity(const char* entTypeName) const { dxfString(0, entTypeName); }
00076         void subClass(const char* sub) const { dxfString(100, sub); }
00077         void layer(const char* layerName)  const { dxfString(8, layerName); }
00078         void color(int col=256) const { dxfInt(62, col); }
00079         void lineType(const char *lt) const { dxfString(6, lt); }
00080         void lineTypeScale(double scale) const { dxfReal(48, scale); }
00081         void lineWeight(int lw) const { dxfInt(370, lw); }
00082 
00083         void coord(int gc, double x, double y, double z=0) const 
00084         {
00085                 dxfReal(gc, x);
00086                 dxfReal(gc+10, y);
00087                 dxfReal(gc+20, z);
00088         }
00089 
00090         // Overloading on pointer & number is a bad idea
00091         void coordTriplet(int gc, const double* value) const
00092         {
00093                 if (value)
00094                 {
00095                         dxfReal(gc, *value++);
00096                         dxfReal(gc+10, *value++);
00097                         dxfReal(gc+20, *value++);
00098                 }
00099         }
00100         
00101         void resetHandle() const { m_handle = 0; }
00102 
00106         void handle() const { dxfInt(5, m_handle++); }
00107 
00108         virtual void dxfReal(int gc, double value) const = 0;
00109         virtual void dxfInt(int gc, int value) const = 0;
00110         virtual void dxfString(int gc, const char* value) const = 0;
00111 
00112 protected:
00113         mutable unsigned long m_handle;
00114 private:
00115 };
00116 
00117 #endif // !defined(DL_WRITER_H)
